description: The Senior Frontend Developer (frontend.dev1) is allocated at 108% capacity in Sprint 2, creating a critical bottleneck and risking burnout, delays, and quality issues.
mitigation_strategy: Immediately reassign at least 20 hours of frontend tasks in Sprint 2 from frontend.dev1 to the underutilized fullstack.dev1.
contingency_plan: Approve overtime or push non-critical UI tasks (e.g., polishing) to a subsequent sprint.
monitoring_trigger: Burndown chart for frontend.dev1 shows no progress in the first 3 days of Sprint 2.

description: The project has single points of failure for critical skills: frontend.dev1 for WPF and qa.engineer1 for E2E testing.
mitigation_strategy: Implement mandatory pair programming between frontend.dev1 and fullstack.dev1 on complex tasks. Document all QA framework setup and processes thoroughly.
contingency_plan: Have a pre-vetted list of WPF and QA contractors ready to engage if a key person is lost.
monitoring_trigger: A key person takes unplanned leave.
